short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle extension for overriding double page offset on Mangadex.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Presently, Mangadex keeps a chapter-by-chapter setting for whether you want to offset the double page spreads by 1. This setting allows you to ensure you are viewing the chapter and 2-page spreads as the mangaka intended. It can be annoying to toggle this for every single chapter while reading through a series, so this extension can be toggled on to permanently override the double page spread offset to on. When switching to reading series on Mangadex uploaded with appropriate spread offset already, the extension can be toggled off to restore the default Mangadex functionality.
